author: Og Mandino
message: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Marston
message: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mark Twain
message: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
title: Thought of the day

author: Zig Ziglar
message: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
title: Thought of the day
